column13: The Modern Slavery Development Working Group at GPT is dedicated to advancing strategies and initiatives to combat modern slavery within the organisation and its supply chains. Comprising multidisciplinary experts and stakeholders, this group collaborates to develop policies, conduct risk assessments, and implement best practices to eradicate modern slavery. By fostering collaboration and driving proactive efforts, the Modern Slavery Development Working Group reinforces GPT's commitment to ethical business practices and human rights.

New suppliers that were screened using social criteria
column7: In 2023, 118 GPT's Priority A suppliers were asked to complete a modern slavery risk questionnaire using the Property Council's Informed 365 platform. The response rate to the survey was 93%, an increase from the 74.4% received in 2022. Where no response is received, a high-level risk assessment is carried out, and further follow-up is undertaken where appropriate.
